00071 class transaction {
00072 public:
00091         class manual {
00092         public:
00106                 template <typename... L>
00107                 manual(obj::pool_base &pop, L &... locks)
00108                 {
00109                         if (pmemobj_tx_begin(pop.get_handle(), NULL,
00110                                              TX_LOCK_NONE) != 0)
00111                                 throw transaction_error(
00112                                         "failed to start transaction");
00113 
00114                         auto err = add_lock(locks...);
00115 
00116                         if (err) {
00117                                 pmemobj_tx_abort(EINVAL);
00118                                 throw transaction_error("failed to"
00119                                                         " add lock");
00120                         }
00121                 }
00122 
00130                 ~manual() noexcept
00131                 {
00132                         /* normal exit or with an active exception */
00133                         if (pmemobj_tx_stage() == TX_STAGE_WORK)
00134                                 pmemobj_tx_abort(ECANCELED);
00135 
00136                         pmemobj_tx_end();
00137                 }
00138 
00142                 manual(const manual &p) = delete;
00143 
00147                 manual(const manual &&p) = delete;
00148 
00152                 manual &operator=(const manual &p) = delete;
00153 
00157                 manual &operator=(manual &&p) = delete;
00158         };
00159 
00160 /*
00161  * XXX The Microsoft compiler does not follow the ISO SD-6: SG10 Feature
00162  * Test Recommendations. "|| _MSC_VER >= 1900" is a workaround.
00163  */
00164 #if __cpp_lib_uncaught_exceptions || _MSC_VER >= 1900
00165 
00184         class automatic {
00185         public:
00203                 template <typename... L>
00204                 automatic(obj::pool_base &pop, L &... locks)
00205                 {
00206                         if (pmemobj_tx_begin(pop.get_handle(), NULL,
00207                                              TX_LOCK_NONE) != 0)
00208                                 throw transaction_error(
00209                                         "failed to start transaction");
00210 
00211                         auto err = add_lock(locks...);
00212 
00213                         if (err) {
00214                                 pmemobj_tx_abort(EINVAL);
00215                                 throw transaction_error("failed to add"
00216                                                         " lock");
00217                         }
00218                 }
00219 
00227                 ~automatic() noexcept
00228                 {
00229                         /* manual abort or commit end transaction */
00230                         if (pmemobj_tx_stage() != TX_STAGE_WORK) {
00231                                 pmemobj_tx_end();
00232                                 return;
00233                         }
00234 
00235                         if (this->exceptions.new_uncaught_exception())
00236                                 /* exit with an active exception */
00237                                 pmemobj_tx_abort(ECANCELED);
00238                         else
00239                                 /* normal exit commit tx */
00240                                 pmemobj_tx_commit();
00241 
00242                         pmemobj_tx_end();
00243                 }
00244 
00248                 automatic(const automatic &p) = delete;
00249 
00253                 automatic(const automatic &&p) = delete;
00254 
00258                 automatic &operator=(const automatic &p) = delete;
00259 
00263                 automatic &operator=(automatic &&p) = delete;
00264 
00265         private:
00269                 class uncaught_exception_counter {
00270                 public:
00277                         uncaught_exception_counter()
00278                             : count(std::uncaught_exceptions())
00279                         {
00280                         }
00281 
00289                         bool
00290                         new_uncaught_exception()
00291                         {
00292                                 return std::uncaught_exceptions() > this->count;
00293                         }
00294 
00295                 private:
00299                         int count;
00300                 } exceptions;
00301         };
00302 #endif /* __cpp_lib_uncaught_exceptions */
00303 
00304         /*
00305          * Deleted default constructor.
00306          */
00307         transaction() = delete;
00308 
00315         ~transaction() noexcept = delete;
00316 
00331         static void
00332         abort(int err)
00333         {
00334                 if (pmemobj_tx_stage() != TX_STAGE_WORK)
00335                         throw transaction_error("wrong stage for"
00336                                                 " abort");
00337 
00338                 pmemobj_tx_abort(err);
00339                 throw manual_tx_abort("explicit abort " + std::to_string(err));
00340         }
00341 
00352         static void
00353         commit()
00354         {
00355                 if (pmemobj_tx_stage() != TX_STAGE_WORK)
00356                         throw transaction_error("wrong stage for"
00357                                                 " commit");
00358 
00359                 pmemobj_tx_commit();
00360         }
00361 
00362         static int
00363         get_last_tx_error() noexcept
00364         {
00365                 return pmemobj_tx_errno();
00366         }
00367 
00399         template <typename... Locks>
00400         static void
00401         exec_tx(pool_base &pool, std::function<void()> tx, Locks &... locks)
00402         {
00403                 if (pmemobj_tx_begin(pool.get_handle(), NULL, TX_LOCK_NONE) !=
00404                     0)
00405                         throw transaction_error("failed to start transaction");
00406 
00407                 auto err = add_lock(locks...);
00408 
00409                 if (err) {
00410                         pmemobj_tx_abort(err);
00411                         pmemobj_tx_end();
00412                         throw transaction_error("failed to add a lock to the"
00413                                                 " transaction");
00414                 }
00415 
00416                 try {
00417                         tx();
00418                 } catch (manual_tx_abort &) {
00419                         pmemobj_tx_end();
00420                         throw;
00421                 } catch (...) {
00422                         /* first exception caught */
00423                         if (pmemobj_tx_stage() == TX_STAGE_WORK)
00424                                 pmemobj_tx_abort(ECANCELED);
00425 
00426                         /* waterfall tx_end for outer tx */
00427                         pmemobj_tx_end();
00428                         throw;
00429                 }
00430 
00431                 auto stage = pmemobj_tx_stage();
00432 
00433                 if (stage == TX_STAGE_WORK) {
00434                         pmemobj_tx_commit();
00435                 } else if (stage == TX_STAGE_ONABORT) {
00436                         pmemobj_tx_end();
00437                         throw transaction_error("transaction aborted");
00438                 } else if (stage == TX_STAGE_NONE) {
00439                         throw transaction_error("transaction ended"
00440                                                 "prematurely");
00441                 }
00442 
00443                 pmemobj_tx_end();
00444         }
00445 
00446 private:
00459         template <typename L, typename... Locks>
00460         static int
00461         add_lock(L &lock, Locks &... locks) noexcept
00462         {
00463                 auto err =
00464                         pmemobj_tx_lock(lock.lock_type(), lock.native_handle());
00465 
00466                 if (err)
00467                         return err;
00468 
00469                 return add_lock(locks...);
00470         }
00471 
00475         static inline int
00476         add_lock() noexcept
00477         {
00478                 return 0;
00479         }
00480 };

00484 } /* namespace nvml */
